price: Mwenyezi Mungu, hakuna mungu ila Yeye Aliye Hai, Msimamizi wa yote milele.
arabic: ٱللَّهُ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ٱلۡحَيُّ ٱلۡقَيُّومُ
footnotes: Mwenyezi Mungu ni Mmoja, hapana mungu isipo kuwa Yeye. Na kila kiliomo ulimwenguni kinashuhudia hayo kwa namna ya kilivyo umbika na kushikamana, katika umbo na kazi, na viumbe vyenginevyo. Na Yeye Mwenyezi Mungu ni Yuhai, hafi. Ni Mwenye kusimamia na kuendesha mambo yote ya ulimwengu. Yeye ndiye Mwenye kuyadabiri (kuyaendesha) na kuyasarifu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: al-lahu lā ilāha illā huwa al-ḥayu al-qayūmu
translations: the Sustainer of all that exists
